Material Type: Aluminum alloy

ZAYAD Reacher grabber USES the premium aluminum alloy materials, you can pick up 3 pounds, don’t worry about
grabber could break,it has a very comfortable handle and a rubber chuck, You can pick up small
objects in red wine glasses and crevices.

After surgery patients or elderly, act not convenient, don’t need to bend over you can pickup
the garbage in the garden, protection from already of lumbar spine, for children, it does
not need to stand on a table or on the steps, you can easily get high objects.

Use it for:
Picking up trash and litter.
Picking up broken glass pieces.
Reaching under furniture and beds.
Retrieving items in hard to reach cabinets.
Picking up daily things such as the newspaper.
Plus many many more uses.

How to Use
1. The arrow on the plastic part of the folding place is aimed at the groove on the aluminum alloy pole.
2. The aluminum alloy chuck is inserted into the hole in the plastic part.
3. Pull the handle switch, clamp the head to close, loosen the switch, clip the head to loosen.

Number of packages: 1 PCS

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();

}

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:21:10 UTC – Details)

From the manufacturer

BELKIN SURGE PROTECTOR

Direct Data Line Protection

* Adding to the 12 surge-protected outlets, the power strip features coaxial protection for your cable or satellite connections.

* With 1-in-2-out RJ11 input where you can directly plug in your telephone or fax machine to secure it against surges and voltage spikes.

Strong Surge Protection

Rated to withstand up to 3,940 joules, this surge suppressor is your premium power protection for your professional workstations, laser printers, broadband modems, and everyday household electronics.

Child Safety Sliding Locks

Each outlet has a sliding safety cover that closes when it is not in use. The covers also prevent dusts and other small particles from entering the socket.

Easily Fits in Different Areas

Equipped with a space-saving flat AC plug for enhanced flexibility and a durable 8 feet cord convenient for hard-to-reach wall receptacles.

Durable and Enduring Build

The Oversized Metal Oxide Varistors (MOVs) absorb excess electricity, and damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust while preventing dents and scratches.

Multi-Outlet Surge Protector Power Strip: Power everything on your desk with a single compact surge-protected extension cord. This reputable power cord offers 12 AC outlets with surge protector for charging your computer, laptop, phone, camera, and more. One charging station for a clutter-free desk.

Power Bar with Phone Line Protection: Featuring a 1-in-2-out RJ11 telephone or fax protection to ensure open and continuous phone line connections. It also provides a coaxial cable protection to safeguard cable box and satellite connections. The damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust.

Power Bar with Phone Line Protection: Featuring a 1-in-2-out RJ11 telephone or fax protection to ensure open and continuous phone line connections. It also provides a coaxial cable protection to safeguard cable box and satellite connections. The damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust.

Compact, Heavy Duty, and Space-Saving: The widely spaced outlets give ample area to fit big plugs and charger bricks. Its slender design makes it ideal for home office, workstations, and game rooms. The durable cord is 8 ft / 2.4 meters long with a 3-prong angle plug convenient for tight spaces.

Reliable Product and Service: Purchase with confidence. Check out the full specs: 6,000 volts maximum spike voltage, 15A AC, 125V, and 1875W. Each outlet has a safety slide lock to close unused sockets safeguarding you and your kids.

Multi-Outlet Surge Protector Power Strip: Power everything on your desk with a single compact surge-protected extension cord. This reputable power cord offers 12 AC outlets with surge protector for charging your computer, laptop, phone, camera, and more. One charging station for a clutter-free desk.
Power Bar with Phone Line Protection: Featuring a 1-in-2-out RJ11 telephone or fax protection to ensure open and continuous phone line connections. It also provides a coaxial cable protection to safeguard cable box and satellite connections. The damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust.
Safeguard Your Devices and Appliances: The electric strip has a 3,940-Joule energy rating providing a reliable power extension cord to protect printers, broadband modems, or home theater systems. It secures your electronic devices from overload, short circuit, power spikes, lightning strikes, or fluctuations.
Compact, Heavy Duty, and Space-Saving: The widely spaced outlets give ample area to fit big plugs and charger bricks. Its slender design makes it ideal for home office, workstations, and game rooms. The durable cord is 8 ft / 2.4 meters long with a 3-prong angle plug convenient for tight spaces.
Reliable Product and Service: Purchase with confidence as it is backed by a limited lifetime warranty and protected by a dollar 200,000 Connected Equipment Warranty. (as of Nov 30,2022 04:59:46 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Choose SMALLRT, Choose Safety

SMALLRT is a comprehensive high-tech enterprise dedicated to the research and development, production and sales of sockets such as power strip, outlet extender, power strip tower.

SMALLRT power strip combine safety, practicality and aesthetics, and are suitable for various places such as office, home, hotel and so on.

A. How did we start?

The SMALLRT brand was founded in 2001. It combines safety, practicality and aesthetics. Once the power strip came out, it was favored by many consumers.

B. What makes our products unique?

We focus not only on safety but also on the practicality and aesthetics of our products. The power strip will also be tested at various levels before they leave the factory.

C. Why do we love what we do?

It is our founder’s goal to let everyone use SMALLRT power strip, and it is the work tenet of every SMALLRT person to make every consumer fall in love with our power strip.

【Overload Protection and Surge Protection 】The surge protector power strip will automatically cut power to protect your expensive devices when a voltage surge is detected. The reset/off switch with integrated circuit breaker for overload protection of all outlets. This outlets power strip has 8-overload protection.
【UL Approved Safe and Durable 】The 6FT upgraded extension cord with multiple outlets is UL approved and made of pure copper. Reinforced design at the junction of the stand of power strip tower and the wire head. To protect the terminal from wear and tear. Environmental protection and fire-resistance PC shell with flame retardant at 1382℉ makes it more durable and longer lifetime.
【USB- C Charge Up to 30% Faster 】4 USB ports total 3.4A, each USB A port features 2.4A Max output. USB C charging port features 3A Max. Built-in with smart technology, detecting charging devices and deliver optimal charging speed automatically, compatible with most USB devices.
【16 IN 1 Tower Power Strip with USB】- This power strip tower surge protector with 12 AC outlets and 4 smart USB (1 USB C) charging ports(5V/3.4A) can power up to 16 electronic devices simultaneously. Integrated circuit breaker and 1800 Joules protection rating ensure the safety of your electronics.
【What You will Get】 Power strip with USB ports, Maunal, our worry-free 12-month, our life time technology support and friendly customer service.The steady base with anti-slip mat on the bottom effectively avoid wobbling and slipping around.

In the event of power overload, the reliable safety switch will trip off automatically to protect your devices and your home. The switch on the base is designed to be perfectly loose, to ensure it won’t get stuck after long time of use. Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets is your best chose!

  • Model: ZYC06
  • Rated Voltage: 110-250V~
  • Rated Current: 10A
  • Maximum Power: 250V / 2500W
  • Frequency: 50/60HZ
  • USB-A Output: 5V 2.4A
  • USB C Output: 5V-3A
  • USB Total Output: 5V-3.4A
  • Material: ABS+Firepoof Material
  • Using Temperature: -10℃～+40℃
  • Power cord specification: 3×0.75mm²
  • Safe protect: Overload Protector Mmultiprise Electrique

Reinforcement of Wire Interface to Prevent Wear

The power strip with USB ports cable is made of 100% copper wire, which power strip tower surge protector has a highly conductive and the cable has good flexibility. And the reinforcement design of the tail makes the product more durable.

Read more

Heat Resistant

This fireproof extension cord with USB Ports is made of ABS+PC, whose ignition temperature is as high as 1382℉ and self-extinguishes right away after it is ignited by fire from outside, the highest level fire-retardant material, it’s very safe and value for money.

Anti-slip mat Sturdy and thicked Base

The power strip tower thicked and broadened base with anti-slip mat on the bottom make the power strip town steadier, maximally preventing wobbling and sliding around.

Two-in-one design

It contain Main swith and overload protection in this switch.

At the RESET side, USB-A & USB-C & AC Outlets are at work. protector de sobretensiones protects your home’s expensive equipment

Read more

Easy to Carry Travel

Size: 6 * 5 * 3.5

Strong product stability. The unique design makes the surge protector tower easy to carry. Small footprint. You can take it anywhere.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $149.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 02:28:48 UTC – Details)

From the brand

High-Speed processor—— CHUWI HeroBox Windows Mini PC features Intel Celeron J4125 low-power processor, 4 cores and 4 threads, Turbo frequency 2.7GHz, which is offers more powerful performance, brings you more smooth and wonderful user experience,and offers you smooth operation and stable multitasking experience.
8GB RAM And 256GB ROM—— Built-in 8GB LPDDR4X, 256GB SSD, supports 512GB Micro SD extension, 512GB TF card,2TB M.2 2280 SSD,2TB 2.5-inch SATA HDD.Multi-task switching speed is extremely fast and no need to wait for application loading, especially in Microsoft Office software.
4K@60Hz Display —— CHUWI HeroBox mini computer adopt Intel UHD Graphics 600 comes with 12 execution, which had 4K ultra high definition streaming capability giving you a best-in-class television experience with true-to-life picture quality, which can be used as a media center to enjoy TV shows or games.The ability to connect with 2 monitors with HD2.0 & VGA outport greatly improves work efficiency.
High-Speed Network—— HeroBox mini gaming pc supports 2.4G+5G dual band WiFi and Bluetooth 4.2 which could be connected with your multimedia devices, mouse, acoustics or headset. with RJ45 Gigabit Ethernet, providing you a stable connection at higher speed. Fanless design, no noise no dust, ensure you a quiet and comfortable experience.
Bring Convenient to Your Life —— All important connections are available:1* Type-C,1* VGA, 1* HDMI 2.0, 1* Gigabit Ethernet , 2* USB 2.0, 2* USB 3.0, 1 * Micro SD Card Port, 1 * Headphone Port. 7.45.41.5 inches compact body only 0.97L,It can be put in a bag and taken away at any time. support to installed on back of the monitor or TV via VESA mount , tidy and space-saving.

  • Faster Running Speed —— CHUWI HeroBox Mini PC equips with 64-bit windows 10 Intel Celeron J4125 Quad-Core Quad-Threaded processor. And loaded with 8GB LPDDR4 RAM, 256GB SSD ROM. Powerful hardware makes it run more smoothly and stable.
  • Expand Storage by Multi-ways —— This Mini Desktop Computers support SATA HDD ( up to 2TB ) and TF card ( up to 512GB）, it comes with 2*USB 2.0 ports, 2 *USB 3.0 ports and Type-c. VGA and HD port are also availble, and the HD port can output 4K@60FPS video.
  • Greatly Improve Transmission Frequency —— HeroBox windows 10 mini pc adopts the latest wireless connectivity with Dual-Band 2.4G+5G Wi-Fi, it offers speeds up to 450Mbps on the 2.4GHz band & 1300Mbps on the 5GHz.
  • Effective Heat Dissipation —— Thermal conductive aluminum alloy are used on HeroBox to ensure continuous effective cooling in all directions. The power-saving HeroBox stays efficient and stable even after long period of work. Continuous 4-hour in use, it stays 34℃.
  • Great Home Theater PC —— CHUWI HeroBox Mirco pc with resolution up to 4096*2160@60Hz and plays 4K video smoothly, giving you a best television experience with true-to-life picture quality,which can be used as a media center to enjoy TV shows or games.
  • Place Anywhere As You Wish —— Install the HeroBox on the back of the monitor or TV via VESA international standard interface to make it an All-In-One PC. Mini body won’t take up tons of desk space and you can simply just slip it into your pocket and travel with it all the time.
  • It Is A Power Saver —— The HeroBox portable pc is intended to be energy-efficient straight out of the box. It packs with energy-efficient hardware components that work closely with the operating system to maintain the overall power consumption lower than 10 watts .
  • Authorized Windows 10 OS/Linux —— Authorized Windows 10 system was pre-installed on HeroBox tower pc, and it tackles down all kinds of tasks with high efficiency. Linux system is also supported to handle more applications use at ease.

From the brand

ANNQUAN specializes in home and office power strips surge protectors. Our charger brings a safe and fast charge. Achieve effective work and lifestyle for people nowadays.

Desk Power Strip Collection

Automatic Pop Up Outlet

Under Desk Power Strip

Power Strip with Switch

RV Generator Adapter Cord

Outdoor Waterproof Power Strip

Home & Office Accessory: Desk power strip with 4 AC outlets and 2 USB-A ports, charges up to 6 devices at the same time.
Safe To Use: Desk clamp power strip, fire-resistant ABS outer shell and built-in safety system, ETL listed.
Specification: AC outlet: 120V, 15A, 60Hz. USB port: 5V/2.1A Max, 4.2A total. Charge phones, tablets and other mobile computing devices at the same time.
Convenient: Desk edge power strip is designed with standard US 3 prong plug, use directly without any adapters. Enjoy the convenience of always having outlets and USB charging ports easily accessible and within reach.
Easy To Install: The desk mounted power strip with the bracket design, tighten up the bracket and it could be installed firmly at the side of your table. Without cutting and drilling, protect your desk.
Attention: Desk power strip clamp fits desk edge thickness size up to 2 inch, the wall from table distance is about 1.4 inch.
Desk Organizer: Clamp power strip is perfect for office desk organizing, attaching to desk, workbench, conference table, shelves, etc.

4 AC Outlets and 4 USB-A Ports Desk Mount Power Strip

The desktop power strip clamps at the edge of the table, or you can mount it on the table legs for more space-saving. Power up your multi devices just at your arm’s reach.

Multi Mounting Spaces

Clamp On Table

Do not take up any table spaces when you’re working, easy to plug and unplug your phone just at your arms reach.

Clamp On Table Legs

Hide the power strip outlet and clamp on table legs if you don’t want it to be shown on your table.

Adjustable Clamp

Please note that the adjustable clamp size must be within 2 inches or else it couldn’t be installed.

Product Description

Achieved An Excellent Balance Between Budget and Performance!

The Dual SIM Unlocked Cell Phone KXD 6A (2021) is Android OS v8.1, 1GB RAM + 8GB ROM, 64GB Expandable(TF card not included), 2500mAh battery, 8MP + 5MP cameras Mobile Phones.

The KXD 6A unlocked cell phone is designed as a value-for-money basic smartphone for everyone. Definitely is the most perfect value-for-money gift for every kids, teenagers, friends, parents and people who never use a smart mobile phone before.Mobile phone, KXD 6A 3G Dual SIM Free Smartphone Unlocked, 5.5″ IPS Full-Screen, Android 8.1 Quad – Core 1GB+8GB/64GB Extension, Dual Rear Camera Triple Card Slots, 2500mAh Battery, Face Recognition

KXD 6A 0.35” slimmer body designed

Distinctive 2.5 Curve Design: KXD 6A’s slim 0.35 inches body is stylish and tasteful. The delicate 2.5D Curves fade cleverly into the sleek lines of the side panels, weighing in at 0.31lb. It is designed compact and pocket-sized to fit perfectly in any pocket or purse.

8MP Dual Rear Camera

KXD 6A features a dual camera system including 8MP primary lens and a 2MP lens. 8MP main lens captures every last detail, bringing you crisp, clear photos. And HDR can help you take better-looking photos.

5MP Front Camera

Show Your Beauty to The World

5MP front camera captures every facial detail in high resolution. And the intelligent mode, lets your unique look shine through in a natural, beautiful way.

DUAL SIM DUAL STANDBY – KXD unlocked Android phones is built-in 3 card slot – 2 sim card slots and a Micro SD slot, which allows you to make a phone call meanwhile playing your phone
ULTRA CLEAR TRIPLE CAMERAS – Our budget phones come with 2 rear cameras- a 5MP main camera and a 2MP sub-camera; besides, a 2MP front camera is also available.Precious memory, instant catch
FACE UNLOCK – this mobile phone for all carriers with face unlock function liberates your hands, just look at the unlocked phone within a second then start to play it. Seamless connection, safer all the time

▲Key Features: 
1. Adapts sockets to power drills and drivers
2. Detent ball for secure socket retention so sockets snap on tightly and won’t slip off
3. 1/4-inch hex shank prevents stripping during high speed drill operation
4. Super strong heat-treated chrome vanadium steel for normal and impact use
5. Sandblasted finish
6. Converts all power drills into speedy socket drivers
7. Use with a hand screwdriver handle or battery/power tool
8. Color coded for easy recognition

● 105°designs for tight spaces, extends the power of a cordless screwdriver, max torque: 10n/m.
● 1/4 inch hex drive shaft is quick change compatible and fits most power drill and driver chucks.
● 105 Degree Right Angle Driver Drilling and Driving Power Screwdriver Drill Attachment with 1/4-inch Hex Quick Change Drive and Magnetic Bit Socket
● Easy & fast, connect to the standard hex screwdrier.
● Can be connected to drill, rechargeable drill or manual wrench.
● Easy, Lightweight, fast, connect to the standard hex screwdrier.
● The gears are mounted in a die cast with 3 durable ball bearings.
● Magnetic 1/4 inch hex socket accepts and holds standard drill and driver bits.
● Perfect handy tool for hard-to-reach areas.Connect hand drill and manual wrench.

CR-V and black phosphate finish. Forged with heat treated chrome vanadium steel for superior strength, each adapter with corrosion-resistant black phosphate finish for against rust and corrosion. Detent ball on adapters provides a secure fit into the socket,reduces wear and prevents rounding off at corners,ensuring does not wobble while working.
【Multifunction-3Pcs】Used in the installation of pneumatic screwdriver, electric screwdriver, pneumatic drill, manual screwdriver and other installation for the hexagonal tool .It is a good accessory for conversion. for Universal Socket,Impact Adapter and Reducer Set,Universal Joint Set,Socket Adapter and Drive Reducer Set,Drive Impact Socket Extension Bar Set,Drive Impact Socket Set.
【Purpose-3Pcs】: This adapter set is designed to provide a securely locked in extension to your existing tool. Provides additional length to reach into a multitude of hard to reach spaces. The spring ball lock ensures a tight fit into the driver head to prevent slipping during use. Specifically machined to fit securely into a hand held driver, drill driver or impact wrench.

From the brand

About DEWENWILS

DEWENWILS has maintained scientific rigor to create pragmatic and design-aesthetic products of great value. Specializing in Tools and Home Improvement, Consumer Electronics and Outdoor Equipment,our products range from Timer Series, Outlet Switches and Light Sockets to Extension Wire and Lamps. Since 2016, our products boom globally, bringing intelligent convenience and new energy infusion to your life

Outdoor Timer

Remote Control Outlet

Low Voltage Transformer

Extension cord reel

BRAND VISION

Back to the essence of your home life-simplicity, safety and comfort

WHAT MAKES DEWENWILS UNIQUE

Attach great caution with the whole productionￚeach product has undergone the product development of a full range of ideas, technical parameters adjustment, strict quality control, and revision based on customer feedback.

WE LOVE WHAT WE DO

Enthusiasm and innovation are our eternal driving force.Simplifying home lives and branding growth are our motivation.Sincere feedback and the love of consumers are reasons for persistence.

【WEATHER-RESISTANT CONNECTION】 This waterproof extension cord connector provides a watertight sealed space to protect outdoor & indoor plug connections from the elements like water, snow, rain, dust, and dirt to ensure circuit safety ( Note: It is just water-resistant. Do not submerse it in water)
【AMPLE & AJUSTABLE COMPARTMENT】Large housing holds both multiple connections and one on one connection; compatible with AWG 12/14/16 extension cord and flat cable; slide to adjust the position of the limiter for different lengths of connections
【FIRM AND TIGHT CONNECTION】Rubber seals at both ends conform well to the power cord; 2 clamps hold the cords tightly in place; adjustable anti-slip serrations keep the cords securely connected to prevent the plugs from sliding or disconnecting even if tug the cords in uses
【DOUBLE LOCK & PROTECTION】 The top lid and 4 extra durable latches enhance the sealing of the outdoor extension cord safety seal; 4 lockable latches secure the cord safety seal box fastened for safe use even if the top lid is broken off
【EASY TO USE】 No tools or installation required; place the extension cord properly; slide the limiter to keep cords securely connected; lock the top lid and 4 latches for seal; hanging to save space; ideal for holiday lights, string lights, pool pumps and garden tools etc

DEWENWILS is a professional manufacturer specializing in Home Improvement, Consumer Electronics and Outdoor Equipment. Our primary aim is to provide you and other valuable members with higher quality products. A satisfying shopping experience is amongst our top priorities.

4-Pack DEWENWILS Extension Cord Safety Cover

Protect You and Your Electrical Devices

Seals out water, snow, rain, dust, and dirt, keeps cords dry and together. Ideal for both indoor and outdoor applications like holiday decoration, string lights, water fountains, pool pumps, garden tools, and power tools, etc.

Note: It is just water-resistant. Do not submerge it in water.

Specifications:

Capacity: 12/14/16 Gauge Cords & Flat Cable

Dimension: 8.07 x 2.83 x2.83 Inch

Available colors: Green & Black

  • Package Includes:
  • Extension cord seal cover x 4
  • Limiter x 4
  • Hanger x 4
  • User Manual x 1

Read more

Fits 12/14/16 Gauge Cords & Flat Cable

Ample compartment holds UP TO 12 GAUGE CORDS and FLAT CABLE.

Adjust to fit multiple connections and one on one connections.

Four Lockable Latches

Lock the weatherproof cover in a tighter way with the top lid and 4 extra lockable latches. Creates a higher degree of sealing by double lock way. When the top lid is broken off, the cord safety seal cover can be locked tightly by these latches for safety uses.

Adjustable Limiter

Slide to adjust the limiter for different lengths of connection. 2 Clamps at both ends fix the cord tightly in place.

The anti-slip serrations keep the cords securely connected to prevent plugs from sliding or disconnecting in pulling.
